titleInfo.title: State of Tennessee, US Bond for Peter Blanton

subject.topic: Blanton, Peter; Ledbetter, R.; Cooley, S.W.

mods.note: Bond statement in which Peter Blanton and R. Ledbetter bound themselves to the State of Tennessee in the sum of $250. This sum was to be voided if Blanton personally appeared before the Judge of the Circuit Court in Dover and answered an indictment for adultery/cohabitating. S.W. Cooley, Sheriff, signed the document as witness.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
